subtitle: This lovely soup can be served hot or chilled.

method.text: Place the onion, celery and stock in a saucepan. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 15 min.
Peel, core and slice the apples. Toss in the lemon juice to help prevent discoloration. Add to the pan. Cook for 10 min, until tender.
Stir in the butter until melted. Add the instant potato. Add the milk. Cook over a low heat for 5 min, stirring frequently until thickened slightly.
Add celery salt and pepper to taste. Liquidise the soup. Serve.

title: Apple and celery soup
